titles.title: A bill to suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on certain ceramic ferrules and sleeves.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1611-1612)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on certain ceramic ferrules and sleeves.
